name: Climb Builder
description:
Climb Builder is a small Puzzle-Platformer game made with GameMaker Studio 2. The concept is very simple : you need to build your way to the trophy (the end of each level). You have a limited quantity of blocks available.

Game and Graphics made by Mud'
Soundtrack made by Artho (https://www.youtube.com/user/artho340)

Controls:

  • Left Arrow, A,  Q : Walk Left.
  • Right Arrow, D : Walk Right.
  • Up Arrow, Space Bar, W, Z : Jump.
  • Click on a Block on the side in a level : Active Add Mode.
  • ESCAP : Disable Add Mode.

Devlog:

  • Alpha 0.1 (November, 3rd, 2020) :
    • First Private Build of the Game. Only 6 levels. Some things are not done.
  • Official Trailer (January, 12nd, 2021)
